name: Immortal Diaries
description:
■Synopsis■
The day you decide to take life into your own hands, fate interferes. You leave the orphanage you grew up in to live in a grand castle that was left as your inheritance, learning shocking revelations regarding your true heritage. A mysterious family heirloom reveals that you are the descendent of Count Ventrue, the first vampire ever created. How are vampires living undetected in society? Why do you seem to be a magnet for mysterious attacks? Can the peace between humans and supernatural creatures be maintained? When four mysterious men enter your life, you must find a way to awaken the power in your veins to grow from a scared, helpless girl into your birthright as Queen of the Vampires.


■Hot Features■
- Thrilling, dangerous and romantic story.
Uncover the secrets hidden in the city and explore the truth of the existence of vampires.

- Supernatural Lovers
Experience different kinds of love with our four male love interests. Find out who will be your Mr. Right!
- Diverse Customization
Dress up your character with all a huge range of styles and set new trends in the city.
- Adorable Pets
Adopt your own puppy and help it find a playmate.
